messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: This call may be recorded for quality and training purposes.

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Hi, I'm calling about my mother Susan Park. I need to find out when her next appointment is.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: For calling PivotPoint Orthopedics, part of Pretty Good AI. Am I speaking with Sarah?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: No, I'm not Sarah. I'm Linda Park, calling about my mother Susan Park's next appointment.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Got it, Linda. I'll help you with your mother's appointment. Can you please tell me Susan's date of birth?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Sure, her date of birth is April 15, 1945.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Just to confirm, can you provide Susan's full name first and last?

messages.speaker: bot
messages.text: Her full name is Susan Park.

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks, Linda. Just to make sure I have it right, can you please spell out your mother's first and last name for me?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: Thanks for spelling that out. Just to confirm, is her first name spelled s u s a n?

messages.speaker: agent
messages.text: And her last name p a r k s?
